name: november
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 the eleventh month of the year, after October and before December: He's starting his new job in November. The next meeting is on 2 November. The factory opened last November.
More examplesFewer examplesI started my job in November.November isn't the best time to go to Iceland.We always go to the fireworks on 5 November.
